actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider selection logic to automatically failover when a provider is unhealthy, improving system resilience.
implementation_steps: Create a new module (circuitBreaker.js) implementing the circuit breaker logic (open/half-open/closed states, error thresholds, reset timeouts).
Integrate the circuit breaker into providerManager.js so that each provider instance is wrapped with the circuit breaker.
Update provider selection logic to skip providers in 'open' state.
Add logging for state transitions and errors.
Write a basic test in providers.test.js to simulate provider failures and verify failover.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming API request and propagate it through backend services for improved traceability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Create a middleware (correlationId.js) that generates or extracts a correlation ID from incoming requests.
Attach the correlation ID to the request object and response headers.
Update logger.js to include the correlation ID in all log entries.
Ensure all route handlers and downstream service calls propagate the correlation ID.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for MCP endpoints and provider health checks to ensure reliability and catch regressions early.
implementation_steps: Identify untested or under-tested MCP endpoints and provider health routes.
Write new Jest tests to cover edge cases (e.g., provider downtime, latency spikes, error responses).
Add assertions for expected status codes, response bodies, and error handling.
Run tests and verify coverage improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Optimize Dockerfile for Multi-Stage Builds and Caching
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor the Dockerfile(s) to use multi-stage builds, reducing image size and improving build cache efficiency for faster deployments.
implementation_steps: Update the Dockerfile to use separate stages for dependencies, build, and final runtime.
Ensure only production dependencies and built artifacts are included in the final image.
Test the new Docker build locally and verify image size reduction.
Update docker-compose.yml if necessary to use the optimized image.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Add TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes to MongoDB telemetry collections to automatically expire old data, improving storage efficiency.
implementation_steps: Identify telemetry collections storing time-series or log data.
Add code in initIndexes.js to create TTL indexes on timestamp fields (e.g., expire after 30 days).
Test by inserting sample data and verifying automatic expiration.
Document the TTL policy in code comments.
